desc-en: Case insensitive mode. Make the remainder of the pattern or subpattern case insensitive.
Multi-line mode. Make $ and ^ in the remainder of the pattern or subpattern match before/after newline.
Single-line mode. Make the . (dot) in the remainder of the pattern or subpattern match newline.
Free spacing mode. Ignore white space in the remainder of the pattern or subpattern.
